body.raw:
{
  "query": "query LvEvents {
  lv_events(user_id: 15, page: 1, per_page: 3) {
    data {
      id
      name
      description
      start_time
      end_time
      location
      created_at
      updated_at
      status
      address
      is_online
      streaming_url
      organizer_name
      organizer_summary
      host_type
      seats_limit_count
      reserved_seats_count
      available_seats
      comments_count
      image
    }
  }
}"
}

graphql.query:
query {
  userGet(id: {{assessmentFeedbackId}} ){
    name
    email
    total_xp
    premium
     journey_checkpoint {
      id
      module_number 
      section_number 
      item_piece_number
      item_number 
      question_number 
    }
    current_plan{
        name
        product_name
    }
    active_subscription{
        id
        name
        start_date
        end_date
        status
    }
    userSubscriptions {
        user_id
        customer_name
        active
        auto_renew
        created_at
        end_date
        expired
        name
        id
        b2b
        b2c
        payment_method
        start_date
        status
        stripe_subscription_id
        suspend
        updated_at
        }
    }
}
